SA05n885:2: ye jinapūrvakāye bhavanti ye ca dhriyanti daśadiśi loke |
SA05n885:3: tān hi jināṃśca karomi praṇāmaṃ taṃ jinasaṃghamahaṃ prabhijaṣye || 1 ||
SA05n885:33: sūkṣmarajopama ye ca bhavanti sūkṣmarajopama ye tiṣṭhanti || 16 ||
SA05n885:34: tāṃśca jinān prakaromi praṇāmaṃ kāyena vācā manasā prasannā |
SA05n885:37: ye ca sunirvṛtasādhujinānāṃ sā ca lalāṭa vicitra anekaiḥ || 18 ||
SA05n885:38: ekajinasya guṇān nahi śakyo jihvasahasreṇa bhāṣitu kiṃcit |
SA05n885:39: kāmamaśakti hi sarvajinānāṃ ekaguṇasya hi vistaravaktum || 19 ||
SA05n885:41: ye jalagrahaṇatu śakyapramāṇaṃ naiva tu ekaguṇā sugatāntam || 20 ||
SA05n885:43: prameya saṃcita puṇyaphalāgraṃ tena ca sattva prabhotu jinatvam || 21 ||
SA05n885:44: eva tu viśvaṃ narapatibuddhaṃ eva karomi nṛpaḥpraṇidhānam |
SA05n885:45: yatra ca kutra ci mabhyabhaveta jāti anāgata kalpamanantā || 22 ||
SA05n885:46: īdṛśabherī paśyami svapne īdṛśanādaṃ tatra śṛṇomi |
SA05n885:47: īdṛśa jinastuti kamalākareṇa jāti jarāsmara tatra labheyam || 23 ||
SA05n885:48: buddhaguṇāni anantamatulyaṃ ye'pi ca durlabha kalpasahasram |
SA05n885:49: anuśruta ye ca svapnagate'pi teṣu ca deśayi divasagato'pi || 24 ||
SA05n885:50: duḥkhasamudra vimocayi sattvā pūrayi ṣaḍabhiḥ pāramitābhiḥ |
SA05n885:53: saṃmukhapaśyami śākyamunīndraṃ vyākaraṇaṃ hyahu tatra labheyam || 26 ||
SA05n885:54: yau ima dārakadvau mama putrau kanakendra kanakaprabhāśvarau |
SA05n885:55: tau ubhi dāraka tatra labheyaṃ bodhimanuttaravyākaraṇaṃ ca || 27 ||
SA05n885:56: ye pi ca sattva anekamanantā śaraṇavihīnā vyasanagatāśca |
SA05n885:59: kalpa anāgata bodhi careyaṃ yattahu pūrvaṃ koṭi gatāśca || 29 ||
SA05n885:61: karmasamudra vikīryatu mahyaṃ kleśasamudra vichidyatu mahyam || 30 ||
SA05n885:62: puṇyasamudraṃ pūryatu mahyaṃ jñānasamudra viśodhyatu mahyam |
SA05n885:63: vimalajñāna prabhāsavareṇa kāma prabhā ca bhaviṣyatu mahyam || 31 ||
SA05n885:64: puṇyaprabhāsa vilocanatā ca sarvatriloki viśiṣṭa bhaveyam |
SA05n885:65: puṇyavareṇa samanvita nityaṃ duḥkhasamudra uttārayitā ca || 32 ||
SA05n885:66: sarvasukhasya ca sāgarakalpaṃ kalpamanāgata bodhi careyam |
